from pyspark.sql.functions import *

df = spark.read.load('abfss://openaisynapsesample@openaisynapsesample.dfs.core.windows.net/adresses.csv', format='csv', header=True, delimiter=';')
display(df)

from synapse.ml.cognitive import OpenAICompletion
from synapse.ml.core.platform import running_on_synapse, find_secret

openai_service = "openai-soferreira"
openai_deployment = "text-davinci-003"

key = find_secret("openai-key", "keyvault-openai-demo")

# API call definition
completion = (
    OpenAICompletion()
        .setSubscriptionKey(key)
        .setDeploymentName(openai_deployment)
        .setUrl("https://openai-soferreira.openai.azure.com/")
        .setPromptCol("prompt")
        .setErrorCol("error")
        .setOutputCol("output"))

# Define prompt to get country code from the address
df = df.withColumn("prompt", 
            concat(lit("Provide Country ISO standard two-letter code for the address: ")
            , col("Address"), lit(" ISO standard two-letter code:")))

# Call API 
df_completion = completion.transform(df).withColumn("Country", col("output.choices.text").getItem(0))
display(df_completion)

# Define prompt to get street from the address
df = df.withColumn("prompt", 
            concat(lit("Provide the street name of the address: ")
            , col("Address"), lit(" Street name:")))

# Call API 
df_completion = completion.transform(df).withColumn("Street", col("output.choices.text").getItem(0))
display(df_completion)

# Define prompt to get postal code from the address
df = df.withColumn("prompt", 
            concat(lit("Provide the postal code of the address: ")
            , col("Address"), lit(" Postal Code:")))

# Call API
df_completion = completion.transform(df).withColumn("Posta Code", col("output.choices.text").getItem(0))
display(df_completion)
